item.description:
MEETUP SUNDAY EAST CAMBRIDGE

The consensus so far is that Sunday is the best day. I live in East Cambridge, near Cambridge St. I will give address & phone only to attendees later. Bring your songs/originals and copies of any you really want to do. I have song books, and computer for downloading.

I have guitars/keyboard, if you play something else bring it. Think about what you want to do. Here is a list that members want to do, or check the Ideas posted previously for more items:

Forming a band, or network of musicians to perform as a band
Music to help world/personal consciousness
Jam sessions leading to other collaboration (weekly/monthly)
Jam sessions to develop and arrange your songs
A CD project recording original songs from group members
Rehearsing originals or covers to play at open mikes

I'm also thinking of going to the Squawk Cafe on Thursday nite, and possibly rehearsing before. If any one is interested, especially if you can't make it Sunday, let me know.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Jam/Reheasal/Meet Kickoff Event
